roleset.name: having female reproductive parts or characteristics
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT.

example.name: arg1
example.text: Dalai Lama: I would be pleased if my successor was female.

example.name: metaphorical arg1
example.text: I bought a 5 pack of Smok Tech Dual coil cartomizers and when I opened the package the threading on the end was female.
